snippet: The restless, grumbling, needy presence that once functioned in the collective mind as an inner voice that hedged against excessive optimism is slipping into the past.
abstract: News analysis; cultural archetype of the neurotic has gradually faded away, largely due to the more specialized vocabulary that psychiatrists have created to describe anxiety, the core component of neurosis.
lead_paragraph: The restless, grumbling, needy presence that once functioned in the collective mind as an inner voice that hedged against excessive optimism is slipping into the past.

headline.seo: Where Have All the Neurotics Gone?
headline.main: Where Have All the Neurotics Gone?
headline.print_headline: Where Have All the Neurotics Gone?
